p: Elemental analysis was conducted at the University of Missouri‐Columbia College of Agriculture, Food and Natural Resources, Chemical Laboratory on dried samples sent for analysis. Samples were wet digested according to AOAC official method 968.08‐D (b) with nitric acid and perchloric acid. After dilution, the filtered samples were introduced into an ICP‐OES (AOAC 985.01‐(A,B,D)).
